law.catch_line: Members to be reimbursed for expenses.
law.text: The members of the board shall not receive compensation for their services but shall be reimbursed for their actual expenses necessarily incurred in the performance of their duties, upon vouchers duly approved by the board, signed by the secretary and countersigned by the president.
law.history: Created 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 176, sec. 9, effective June 13, 1968.
